abstract: Larry Brown, who either resigned or was fired by the Bobcats last season, is still looking for another job in the N.B.A. at age 71.
snippet: Larry Brown, who either resigned or was fired by the Bobcats last season, is still looking for another job in the N.B.A. at age 71.
lead_paragraph: Like a moth to a flame, Larry Brown can't seem to stay away from basketball. Brown, 71, last coached the Charlotte Bobcats, who either resigned or was fired, depending on the story, last season.

headline.main: Brown Still Longs to Coach in N.B.A.
